name: part_008
file: tmp_【#2ETAnniv】 Zeta's Mini 3D Party!【Vestia Zeta ⧸ Hololive ID】 [YOD6oVkRp9E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Vestia Zeta performs the song 'Cho Medetai Song ~Konnani Shiawasede Iinokana?~'.
MC section where Zeta puts on sunglasses and introduces the next song as 'DJ Seven'.

subtitles.original: Cho Medetai Song ~Konnani Shiawasede Iinokana?~
subtitles.english: Super Happy Song ~Is it okay to be this happy?~

subtitles.original: 本日ハレの日 雨でもハレ
subtitles.english: Today is a celebratory day, even if it rains, it's sunny

subtitles.original: 一生に一度のエブリデイ だけどやっぱり今日はスペシャル
subtitles.english: A once-in-a-lifetime everyday, but today is special after all

subtitles.original: 本日の衣装は悩みません
subtitles.english: I won't worry about today's outfit

subtitles.original: 一周回ってまシンプル だけどアレでもやっぱ派手すぎ？
subtitles.english: In the end, it's simple, but is it still too flashy?

subtitles.original: 来年の今は記念日 それまではたくさんもっと
subtitles.english: Next year today will be an anniversary, until then, much more

subtitles.original: どうでもいいことと超重要かもね
subtitles.english: Things that don't matter and things that might be super important

subtitles.original: そして大事なこと まずはトゥデイのぶち上げよう
subtitles.english: And an important thing, first let's hype up today

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 私こんなに幸せでいいのかな
subtitles.english: Is it okay for me to be this happy?

subtitles.original: なんてホントはそのこと悩んでないけど
subtitles.english: I say that, but I'm not actually worried about it

subtitles.original: だってちょっとくらいのマイナスもなきゃ
subtitles.english: Because there should be at least a little bit of negative

subtitles.original: って思うくらいにいい感じ
subtitles.english: It feels so good that I think that

subtitles.original: まぁね こんなに幸せでいいので
subtitles.english: Well, since it's okay to be this happy

subtitles.original: だって私自分で選んだんだから
subtitles.english: Because I chose it myself

subtitles.original: 犬は駆け回り 猫は可愛いし
subtitles.english: Dogs run around, cats are cute

subtitles.original: 青い鳥は飛ぶ みんながいる
subtitles.english: Bluebirds fly, everyone is here

subtitles.original: 当日はケの日 普通にいい
subtitles.english: The day itself is an ordinary day, it's normally good

subtitles.original: 一生で一番ギャングな日 だけど仕方ないですよ
subtitles.english: The most "gang" day of my life, but it can't be helped

subtitles.original: って感じで冷めたりもしてるよ
subtitles.english: I'm feeling a bit detached like that too

subtitles.original: サプライズのメッセージ 驚くはずないでお決まり
subtitles.english: A surprise message, I won't be surprised, it's standard

subtitles.original: 一昨年の今は他人で それまではたくさんもっと
subtitles.english: Two years ago today we were strangers, until then, much more

subtitles.original: 無駄かも手放せないとかしあわせね
subtitles.english: It might be pointless, but being unable to let go is happiness, isn't it?

subtitles.original: だけど大事なこと 今は本当に大好きで
subtitles.english: But an important thing, right now I really love it

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: あなたこんなに幸せでいいのかな
subtitles.english: Is it okay for you to be this happy?

subtitles.original: なんてホントはそのこと心配ないけど
subtitles.english: I say that, but I'm not actually worried about it

subtitles.original: だってちょっとくらいの試練もなきゃ
subtitles.english: Because there should be at least a little bit of trial

subtitles.original: って思うくらいにいい感じ
subtitles.english: It feels so good that I think that

subtitles.original: まぁね 結局幸せでいいので
subtitles.english: Well, in the end, it's okay to be happy

subtitles.original: だって私ちゃんと戦ったんだから
subtitles.english: Because I fought properly

subtitles.original: お神輿に乗って 花火も上げて
subtitles.english: Ride the portable shrine, set off fireworks

subtitles.original: いいことは全部一度にしよう
subtitles.english: Let's do all the good things at once

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 私こんなに幸せでいいのかな
subtitles.english: Is it okay for me to be this happy?

subtitles.original: なんてホントはそのこと悩んでないけど
subtitles.english: I say that, but I'm not actually worried about it

subtitles.original: だってちょっとくらいのマイナスもなきゃ
subtitles.english: Because there should be at least a little bit of negative

subtitles.original: って思うくらいにいい感じ
subtitles.english: It feels so good that I think that

subtitles.original: まぁね こんなに幸せでいいので
subtitles.english: Well, since it's okay to be this happy

subtitles.original: だって私自分で選んだんだから
subtitles.english: Because I chose it myself

subtitles.original: 犬は駆け回り 猫は可愛いし
subtitles.english: Dogs run around, cats are cute

subtitles.original: 青い鳥は飛ぶ みんながいる
subtitles.english: Bluebirds fly, everyone is here

subtitles.original: 最高の今におめでとうだよ
subtitles.english: Congratulations to this greatest moment

subtitles.original: Ay, ay, ay, ay, ay, ay, ay, ay, ay...
subtitles.english: Ay, ay, ay, ay, ay, ay, ay, ay, ay...

subtitles.original: Mic check, mic check, one, two.
subtitles.english: Mic check, mic check, one, two.

subtitles.original: Mic check, one, two, ay, ay, ay...
subtitles.english: Mic check, one, two, ay, ay, ay...

subtitles.original: What's up?
subtitles.english: What's up?

subtitles.original: DJ Seven on the house, yo!
subtitles.english: DJ Seven on the house, yo!

subtitles.original: So, next song is the rap of the night.
subtitles.english: So, next song is the rap of the night.

subtitles.original: Actually, it's not even rap. I don't know if you guys... it's the rap of the night, for sure.
subtitles.english: Actually, it's not even rap. I don't know if you guys... it's the rap of the night, for sure.

subtitles.original: Can you... can you trust me enough if I say it's a rap song?
subtitles.english: Can you... can you trust me enough if I say it's a rap song?

subtitles.original: What if it's like a ballad? A ballad song.
subtitles.english: What if it's like a ballad? A ballad song.

subtitles.original: Anyway, so I have a really cool song...
subtitles.english: Anyway, so I have a really cool song...

subtitles.original: ...and I want you guys to scream with me!
subtitles.english: ...and I want you guys to scream with me!
